Articles.Content:
Hey there!

I\'m a guy from Austria who hates CAPTCHA and is very interested in space-flight and general space stuff.

Playing Orbiter for a few months i got bored of it and it\'s over-realism ( less game, more simulator, but that\'s what it is supposed to be )

and through a friend I got myself playing KSP .13 for a little while and when the new versions became preorder-only

I finally decided to buy it when .15 came out and can\'t say I\'m regretting it.

Been playing the hell out of this game (even managed to scare Jeb), now looking into addons and doing challenges.

I have a good understanding of C# aswell, so maybe I\'ll try and make some addons too.

Glad to be here with other enthusiasts

Cya,

Naelo

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

The CAPTCHA will go away after 5 posts. It\'s there to help fend off spammers and we get a lot of those still attempting to try.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
